data.comment: Huddersfield kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Josh Koroma gives Huddersfield a 0-1 lead in London.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Millwall have kicked-off the second half at The Den.
The home team have replaced Tom Bradshaw with Matt Smith. This is the first substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
In the minute 46, Carlos Corberan is making the team's first substitution at The Den with Juninho Bacuna replacing Alex Pritchard.
Mahlon Romeo (Millwall) has received a yellow card from Gavin Ward.
Ryan Leonard (Millwall) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 65, Mason Bennett is replacing Scott Malone for Millwall at The Den.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a second substitution, with Pipa replacing Adama Diakhaby.
The home team have replaced Connor Mahoney with Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson. This is the third substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
In the minute 84, Fraizer Campbell is replacing Isaac Mbenza for the away team.
That's full-time at The Den. The final score is 0-3.
